thread.title: Glass ceiling for dogs? Males win Westminster more often

title: Glass ceiling for dogs? Males win Westminster more often
text:
Glass ceiling for dogs? Males win Westminster more often 11:08am GMT - 01:26 
Female dogs, known in pure-bred circles as “bitches,” have snared Best in Show at Westminster 39 times since the award was first given in 1907. Males, known simply as “dogs,” have been victorious 71 times, almost twice as often. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Female dogs, known in pure-bred circles as “bitches,” have snared Best in Show at Westminster 39 times since the award was first given in 1907. Males, known simply as “dogs,” have been victorious 71 times, almost twice as often.
